Item.value:
Instructions:
1. Prepare CAD data & BOM data and add under Solutions Folder. 2. Ensure that all children of the assembly In the Solution Item are released.
1. Create MCN 2. Assign Specialist, Analyst 3. Check the Problem,Impacted,Change reference 4. Check the Solution Item 5. Paste the Solution Item in the Solutions Folder from ECN
1. Select True, if MCN is required and created for the ECN. 2. Select Fasle, if MCN is not required for the ECN.

UserValue.title: handler_argument
UserValue.value: -subject=TASK:[PLM Notification] Data transfer to Vinfast and Suppliers

Item.value:
Instructions:
Verify the Solution Items and provide the review for approval & release
1. Check Rejection comments and do rework. 2. Verify ECN. 3. Complete task.

1. Fill following properties.
+) SQE: key in information about PPAP +) MFG/SCM: Planed break point date & Actual break point date & Vin number
2. Acknowledge the task.

1. Fill following properties.
+) DP: key in information about PO/PR number
2. Acknowledge the task.
